title: Number of outbound trips from China to Europe in 2018 , by region of destination
summary: This is a bar chart representing Europe European Union in the x axis and Arrivals in millions in the y axis.
Europe European Union Central/Eastern Europe has the highest Arrivals in millions and Southern/Mediterranean Europe has the lowest Arrivals in millions.
The maximum Europe European Union Central/Eastern Europe has got 5.29 times higher Arrivals in millions than the minimum Europe European Union Southern/Mediterranean Europe.
min_summary: This bar chart has 4 columns on the x axis representing Europe European Union, and Arrivals in millions in each Europe European Union on the y axis.
The maximum Arrivals in millions 5.93 is found at Europe European Union Central/Eastern Europe and the minimum is found at Southern/Mediterranean Europe where Europe European Union is 1.12.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Europe European Union in the x axis and Arrivals in millions in the y axis.
Europe European Union Central/Eastern Europe has the highest Arrivals in millions and Southern/Mediterranean Europe has the lowest Arrivals in millions.
The maximum Europe European Union Central/Eastern Europe has got 5.29 times higher Arrivals in millions than the minimum Europe European Union Southern/Mediterranean Europe.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Europe European Union in the x axis and Arrivals in millions in the y axis.
The maximum Arrivals in millions 5.93 is found at Europe European Union Central/Eastern Europe and the minimum is found at Southern/Mediterranean Europe where Europe European Union is 1.12.
Europe European Union Western Europe has the second highest value for Arrivals in millions.
The difference of Arrivals in millions between the highest and lowest Europe European Union is 4.81.

Europe European Union Central/Eastern Europe is higher than any other Europe European Unions with value 5.93, followed by Western Europe, and Northern Europe. Down to Europe European Union Southern/Mediterranean Europe with the lowest value 1.12.
The Europe European Union Central/Eastern Europe tends to be 1.68 percent higher than average.
Summing up the values of all Europe European Unions, we get total 14.1.
